name: Less-mixins
body:
### Welcome to Less Mixins.
This is a collection of mixins that I use often with different projects.
Each one tries to by cross-browser friendly.

### Usage
Usage is actually rather simple, you need to include the contents of less_mixin.less in to your project.

1. Download / Clone this project.
2. Copy less_mixin.less into the same directory as the rest of your .less files
3. ``@import "less_mixin";`` near the head of you main .less file.
4. When you wish to use one of the mixins just include it in the declaration of the CSS block:

    .roundedbox {
        border: 1px solid black;
        z-index: 999;
        .mixin-rounded(8px);
    }

The above just added rounded corners with a radius of 8px to any element with the class roundedbox applied to it.

### Authors and Contributors
Maintained by @timc3

### Lots of thanks to
* [http://lesscss.org/](http://lesscss.org/)
* [http://www.css3files.com/](http://www.css3files.com/)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Post an issue to the GitHub issue page.
tagline: A number of mixins to make life easier with LessCSS
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
